codes:
import sys

n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i]
    if a[i] < 0:
        a[i] *= x
    ans += a[i]

print(ans)

import sys

n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i] * x

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i] * x

print(ans)
